tool_description: The Units Converter API allows developers to easily add a unit converter to their applications. This is done by performing HTTP GET requests with the appropriate parameters.
name: units converter
title: units converter

api_list.name: Convert to all units
api_list.description: Converts the given quantity of a unit to the equivalent amount of all other units of a given measurement that the API provides conversion between. The legal values for measurement can be obtained from the API call GET: dev/measurements. The legal values for the units can be obtained from the API call GET: dev/{measurement}/allUnits.

api_list.name: Get measurements
api_list.description: Returns an array of all the measurements for which the API provides conversion
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://units-converter.p.rapidapi.com/dev/measurements"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "units-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

api_list.name: Get all the units of a measurement
api_list.description: Returns all the units of a measurement that the API provides conversion between. The legal values for measurement can be obtained from the API call GET: dev/measurements.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://units-converter.p.rapidapi.com/dev/angle/allUnits"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "units-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://units-converter.p.rapidapi.com/dev/{measurement}/allUnits"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "units-converter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Convert a quantity from one unit to another
api_list.description: Converts the given quantity in one unit to the equivalent quantity in another, for a given measurement, and returns the answer. The legal values for measurement can be obtained from the API call GET: dev/measurements. The legal values for the units can be obtained from the API call GET: dev/{measurement}/allUnits.
